name: Find Islands
desc:
Given a 2D matrix with 0s and 1s, write a function to count the number of islands.

A group of connected 1s forms an island. For example, the below matrix contains 4 islands 

0011010
0010010
1000110
0000001
code_ruby:
# @param mat, integer matrix
# @return integer
